Name: Drama Elementals (1 per party member)
Description: Manifestations of raw gossip energy that spread chaos wherever they go. They thrive on secrets and misunderstandings.
description 1: Deals psychic damage and forces the target to make a Wisdom save or spill a secret. Ranged attack, 30 ft. Psychic damage (4d8).
description 2: Enemies within 10 feet have disadvantage on Insight checks due to emotional distraction.

Name: Fashion Mimic
Description: A fashionista with a designer handbag or high heel that animates to attack anyone who questions its authenticity.
description 1: A whip-like strap attack. Grapples enemies who touch it (escape DC 13).
description 2: Drains Charisma points temporarily. Target loses 1d4 Charisma for 1 hour if hit.

Name: Sabotage Spirit
Description: A spectral figure embodying petty rivalries. It whispers lies to create paranoia among the party.
description 1: Forces two allies to attack each other unless they pass a Wisdom saving throw. (Recharge 5â€“6) The Sabotage Spirit whispers manipulative lies into the minds of two creatures within 30 ft. The creatures must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be compelled to use their next action to attack each other.
description 2: Disappears after causing mayhem, only to reappear later. As a bonus action, the spirit shifts into the Ethereal Plane, avoiding damage until the start of its next turn.

Name: Wine Elemental
Description: A swirling creature of spilled wine, fueled by tantrums and table-flipping energy.
description 1: Throws acidic wine that deals damage and ruins clothing (lowers Charisma temporarily). Ranged attack, 20 ft., Acid damage (3d6).
description 2: Area attack causing bludgeoning damage and knocking targets prone. (Recharge 5â€“6): Area attack, 10 ft. radius. Creatures make a DC 14 Dex save or take 4d8 bludgeoning damage and are knocked prone.

Name: Karen Chimera
Description: A monster with the heads of a lion, a snake, and a middle-aged woman demanding to speak to the manager of your adventuring party.
description 1: Stuns party members for one round. DC 15 Wisdom save or be stunned for 1 round.
description 2: Deals psychic damage based on unresolved grievances. Melee attack, +6 to hit, 2d10 psychic damage.

Name: Reality Wight
Description: Undead beings who drain vitality through exhausting arguments over trivial matters.
description 1: Deals necrotic damage and adds a level of exhaustion. Melee attack, +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 3d8 necrotic damage, and the target gains 1 level of exhaustion.
description 2: Summons illusions of past drama to distract party members. Creates illusory copies of past conflicts in a 20 ft. radius, forcing all creatures in the area to make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they are incapacitated until the end of their next turn.

Name: Gangster
Description: a humanoid creature with a combination of physical and social abilities to make them feel dangerous and resourceful.
description 1:
Attack Roll: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.
 Damage: 5 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
 Description: Makes punches deadlier and emphasizes their role as street brawlers.
description 2:
Attack Roll: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.
 Damage: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
 Description: A simple, effective weapon, doubling as a tool for intimidation.

Name: The Table Titan
Description: A massive animated dining table imbued with the spirit of legendary arguments.
damage immunities: Bludgeoning, poison, psychic, Fire (polished wood surface)
description 1: Bludgeons targets with its legs. Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 3d10 + 6 bludgeoning damage.
description 2: Throws plates and cutlery as ranged attacks. The Table Titan hurls broken plates, glasses, and utensils in a 15 ft. radius. Creatures must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d8 piercing damage on a failed save or half on a success.
description 3: As an action, the Table Titan flips itself, creating a shockwave in a 30 ft. radius. All creatures in range must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone and take 6d10 bludgeoning damage.

Name: Megan Lystrada
Description: A recurring nemesis who can manipulate others into conflict. She pulls strings behind the scenes to ruin alliances. infamous for her cutting wit and enemy of Allana
description 1: Lowers Charisma temporarily. Melee or ranged spell attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. Hit: 3d8 psychic damage, and the targetâ€™s Charisma score is reduced by 1d4 for 1 hour.
description 2: Creates illusions of betrayal to sow mistrust among the party. She targets up to three creatures within 60 ft. Each target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become paranoid for 1 minute, perceiving allies as enemies and unable to benefit from friendly spells or abilities.
description 3: As a bonus action, Kim D summons 1d4 Fashion Mimics or Sabotage Spirits within 20 ft.

Name: Tes, the Tantrum Queen
Description: Inspired by Teresa Giudice, this boss is a fiery barbarian archetype who channels her rage into table-flipping and verbal attacks.
description 1: A ranged attack that deals area damage Ranged attack, +7 to hit, 3d12 bludgeoning damage in a 15 ft. line.
description 2: Gains strength when fighting alongside minions representing family members. Gains +2 to damage for each ally within 10 feet.
description 3: Cannot be charmed or frightened when enraged.

Name: Vinny Romano
Description: An enforcer and cleaner for the mob
description 1:
Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target.
 Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
description 2: Vinny targets one creature within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.
description 3: Allies within 30 feet of Vinny that can see or hear him gain advantage on saving throws against being frightened and can add his Charisma modifier (+4) to attack rolls.
